Subsection.Text: Bonds or certificates, when validated under this chapter, shall have stamped or written thereon, by the proper officers of such county, municipality or district issuing them, a statement in substantially the following form:
“This bond is one of a series of bonds which were validated by judgment of the Circuit Court for County, rendered on , (year).”
A certified copy of the judgment or decree shall be received as evidence in any court in this state.
